main event: A cigar-shaped, reddish-colored object with no sound was observed and radio contact was established with the unidentified flying object (UFO) on June 21, 1955 in Glenavon, California.
interesting points: The object was observed for 15 minutes.
The object was sighted while the witness was looking for an aircraft.
The object was observed at an altitude of 045 degrees, heading east after making a circle.
The witness used binoculars to observe the object.
The weather conditions were foggy with a visibility of 5 miles.
result: Definitely identified as radio contact established with a UFO.
